question: Who has been elected as the new President of Guatemala?
explanation: Alejandro Giammattei has become the newly elected President of Guatemala, after winning the second round of the 2019 presidential election.He tried 3 times previously to become president before succeeding on his 4th attempt. He campaigned on a promise to fight crime and build a permanent political force with a deep love for God, family and Guatemala with his Vamos political party. He cites Mahatma Gandhi as his most admired world figure.
